game_name: Space Channel 5 VR Kinda Funky News Flash!
game_description: Dance is your power to protect the earth against invading aliens. SEGA‚Äôs legendary Dreamcast rhythm game "Space Channel 5" is coming to virtual reality as "Space Channel 5 VR Kinda Funky News Flash!". Heroine Ulala will navigate you through the world of "Space Channel 5". Your task is to master a series of life saving dancing poses while tuning into the cool beat. More poses you strike, more viewer ratings you get! Kick ass dancing experience, guarantee 100% satisfaction & WOW factor. Experience the return of Ulala for yourselves! * This package includes "MIKU'S FAR-OUT REPORT SHOW!", which allows you to dance with MIKU HATSUNE, and 10 additional costumes.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), Japanese
review_1: Like another reviewer mentioned, I just bought this and cannot play it. Whenever I start it the cloud sync message starts and then it crashes back to the home environment. I tried to start it over and over and one time it booted into the game, but after I exited I'm back in the same situation. Perhaps it is incompatible with v55? Rebooting and reinstalling made no difference. I'll update the review if a fix can be found
review_2: I just bought this app and it's not working at all! It won't open. It's showing cloud sync then doesn't open no matter how many times I've tried. Did I pay for nothing? What can I do ? I want to play this app and it doesn't open.
review_3: I was so excited to play this. but this is such a let down. such short gameplay. finished the few levels, in a night. felt cheated. was so excited to see miku. but it's all sooo short! update and augment this please
review_4: This game was a part of my childhood and the moment I saw it I downloaded it and started playing so as you can imagine my sadness when there was ONLY 4 chapters I‚Äôm sure that you guys can make the whole play through for the faith and trust of your customers. BTW I played all four already and I was very happy and it was fun I‚Äôve had it for like an hour üò©
review_5: Honestly, if you're a fan of the original space channel 5 and you own a quest, you need to play this. It was so much fun üòÖ had a smile on my face for most of the game. I was super glad I could switch to the Japanese dub aswell üôè The ONLY reason why this isn't 5 stars is it's literally under an hour. You'll best the entire thing SUPER quickly. You can pick up the original for a couple dollars, but the price is kind of steep for a couple hours of fun. I'd buy DLC in a heartbeat, or a follow-up game (hopefully they make that a little longer) ~ but I do HIGHLY recommend this game üíñ 4/5*'s (even though it's actually 5/5 and it's just a little too short) üòÖ
